definition: thin or slender/finely particulate/thin and soft/fine/delicate/trifling/(of a sound) quiet/frugal
to bank up with earth/to cultivate (lit. or fig.)/to train (people)
to raise (animals)/to bring up (children)/to keep (pets)/to support/to give birth

sentences.english: Methods To cultivate human uterine leiomyoma cells by digestive method and explanted culture in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用消化法及贴块法进行体外子宫肌瘤细胞培养。

sentences.english: The culture supernatant of tumor cell lines was not cytoxic.
sentences.chinese: 白血病细胞培养上清液无细胞毒作用。

sentences.english: Results At the 20th passage, the SHEE cell remained monolayer, anchorage-dependent and attachment-inhibited growth.
sentences.chinese: 结果细胞培养呈单层，锚定依赖和接触抑制生长。

sentences.english: The microculture assay has also been briefly discussed.
sentences.chinese: 本文还对微量细胞培养试验方法作简要的讨论。

sentences.english: The new bags facilitate the sterile handling of cell cultures.
sentences.chinese: 新的袋子是细胞培养的无菌操作变的容易。

sentences.english: Cell culture is a promising way of CoQ10 production.
sentences.chinese: 烟草细胞培养是获得辅酶Q10的一条有效途径。

sentences.english: The cells that I showed you dying in cell culture are dying from methylmercury.
sentences.chinese: 我给你看死于乙基汞的细胞培养中的细胞。

sentences.english: Results Fibroblast-like cells could grow up in each group.
sentences.chinese: 结果各组均有纤维母细胞样细胞培养出。

sentences.english: Improved explant culture was a good culturing method for rat DF cells.
sentences.chinese: 改良组织块法是一种良好的大鼠牙囊细胞培养方法。

sentences.english: Used in cell culture to prevent proteolytic damage to cells and to extend lifetime of cells.
sentences.chinese: 用于细胞培养中防止细胞蛋白的水解并延长细胞寿命。

sentences.english: Methods The fresh human hilar cholangiocarcinoma specimen was cultured.
sentences.chinese: 方法将人肝门部胆管癌标本进行细胞培养，传代。

sentences.english: Objective The Aim is to study the cryopreservation of the cultured epidermal cell sheets.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究表皮细胞培养膜片的冷冻保存。

sentences.english: The cultured vitelline cells from adult Schistosoma japonica were observed ultrastructurally.
sentences.chinese: 从超微结构水平研究日本血吸虫卵黄细胞培养的动态。

sentences.english: Methods Use villus cell culture and the chromosome with G-bands by trypsin using Giemsa.
sentences.chinese: 方法绒毛细胞培养法及G显带制作染色体分析。
通过细胞培养分离病毒。

sentences.english: Effect of gibberellin and chlorocholine chloride on taxanes production was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 考察了矮壮素和赤霉素对细胞培养生产紫杉烷的影响。
